It seems to be done doing whta it's doin: Oh yeah you've got to shut it down properly
have you tried mounting this at a terminal?
you could fix this device using ntfsfix
sudo aptitude install ntfsprogs && sudo ntfsfix /dev/sdXX  # where /dev/sdXX is the device of the windows partition
can't you boot up into windows' safe mode?
boot up into safe mode and run chkdsk on the drive
you might even be able to fix whatever is wrong with your windows from safe mode.. but more on that in ##windows
